professional.team17.com.professional

Class ElasticSearchController

  • java.lang.Object
    • professional.team17.com.professional.ElasticSearchController

  • public class ElasticSearchController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class will handle the connection and async tasks to the es server

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ElasticSearchController.AddProfile
      This AsyncTask will add a profile to the db (can also be used to update profile)
      static class  ElasticSearchController.AddTask
      This AsyncTask will add a task to the db.
      static class  ElasticSearchController.DeleteProfile
      This AsyncTask will update a task from the db based on a taskid
      static class  ElasticSearchController.DeleteTask
      This AsyncTask will update a task from the db based on a taskid
      static class  ElasticSearchController.GetProfile
      This AsyncTask will retrieve profile from the db matching a username.
      static class  ElasticSearchController.GetTask
      This AsyncTask will retrieve a task from the db based on a taskid
      static class  ElasticSearchController.GetTasks
      This async task will return a list of task dependent on the preformatted query
      static class  ElasticSearchController.UpdateTask
      This AsyncTask will update a task from the db based on a taskid

      • getSearch

        public TaskList getSearch(java.lang.String query)
        Parameters:
        query - - the list of words to be searched
        Returns:
        - TaskList of all tasks that match ANY word in query and are in either status bidded or requested

      • getTasksSearch

        public TaskList getTasksSearch(java.lang.String username)
        Parameters:
        username - - the username to be matched against the task bidder username
        Returns:
        - TaskList of all tasks that match query, (in requested/bidded" and NOT with the username
